Tobirama creates a large pool of water that, after firing the enemy into the air, shoots numerous water bullets at them and then finishes by forming the water bullets into a water dragon which attacks the target, sending them crashing into the ground.

== Trivia ==
* The hand seals used to form the water into the water dragon are the same hand seals [[Tobirama]] uses for [[Water Release: Water Formation Wall]] in the anime.
